title: Accused of Scripting
body:
[](https://imgur.com/CyqWp6W)

[](https://imgur.com/CyqWp6W)

I'm a trash gold player. I get accused of scripting all the time. A lot of the time the whole other team will curse me out and report me. Or relentlessly harass me for losing even though I scripted.

I don't script. Could I get a verified not scripter badge or something?

I've had a few dozen game like this and I'm tired of it.

replies.body:
It comes with being a good Xerath player. I played a lot of Xerath at the start of the season, havn't been playing him much recently. One of my favorite champions, and if you're good at him you're going to be called a scripter by someone. I find some joy in it as they thought I played that good and they just can't handle that someone is better than them. So many people just can't handle playing video games with others.
Being reported for something you didn't do won't do anything. Riot's system is actually pretty good and if you do end up getting some sort of punishment (because not everything is perfect) then you would be able to submit a support ticket and it should be figured out quickly.

Goodness I love myself some good Xerath plays.
